name: GDKO Round 2: Grapple Gun!
description:
A perspective-flipping game now with a grappling hook. For my character's toy I created this grapple mechanic that functions differently depending on which perspective you are in.

In the side-scrolling perspective, grappling allows you to swing across gaps using your momentum. In the top-down view, it is used as a hookshot that zips you to your grapple point.
